languages.text: {n}Дознаватель медлит. Затем добавляет чуть изменившимся голосом, с едва уловимой улыбкой на губах.{/n} "Кроме того... мы так и не побеседовали в спокойной обстановке. Я надеюсь, что мы сможем исправить это после того, как я выполню свою миссию".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель медлит. Затем добавляет чуть изменившимся голосом, с едва уловимой улыбкой на губах.{/n} "Кроме того... мы так и не побеседовали в спокойной обстановке. Я надеюсь, что мы сможем исправить это после того, как я выполню свою миссию".

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator pauses. He then faintly smiles and adds in a slightly different tone,{/n} "Might I add that we still haven't had a chance to speak under less demanding circumstances? I hope we can revisit that once I have completed my mission."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель медлит. Затем добавляет чуть изменившимся голосом, с едва уловимой улыбкой на губах.{/n} "Кроме того... мы так и не побеседовали в спокойной обстановке. Я надеюсь, что мы сможем исправить это после того, как я выполню свою миссию".

traits.locale_text: {n}He pauses. Then he adds in a slightly different tone, smiling faintly,{/n} "Might I add that we still haven't had a chance to speak under less demanding circumstances. I hope we can remedy that once I have completed my mission."

{n}The Interrogator pauses. He then faintly smiles and adds in a slightly different tone,{/n} "Might I add that we still haven't had a chance to speak under less demanding circumstances? I hope we can revisit that once I have completed my mission."

{n}The Interrogator pauses. He then faintly smiles and adds in a slightly different tone,{/n} "Might I add that we still haven't had a chance to speak under less demanding circumstances? I hope we can revisit that once I have completed my mission."

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur s'interrompt, puis esquisse un sourire timide, ajoutant sur un ton différent :{/n} « Du reste, nous n'avons toujours pas eu l'occasion de discuter en des circonstances moins difficiles. J'espère pouvoir revenir vous voir quand j'aurai terminé ma mission. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator pauses. He then faintly smiles and adds in a slightly different tone,{/n} "Might I add that we still haven't had a chance to speak under less demanding circumstances? I hope we can revisit that once I have completed my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur s'interrompt, puis esquisse un sourire timide, ajoutant sur un ton différent :{/n} « Du reste, nous n'avons toujours pas eu l'occasion de discuter en des circonstances moins difficiles. J'espère pouvoir revenir vous voir quand j'aurai terminé ma mission. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希顿了顿，随后微微一笑，以略带不同的语气补充道。{/n}“可以允许我补充一下吗？我们一直都没能找到机会，在不太紧急的情况下交谈。等我的任务完成之后，我希望能和你有机会再聊聊。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator pauses. He then faintly smiles and adds in a slightly different tone,{/n} "Might I add that we still haven't had a chance to speak under less demanding circumstances? I hope we can revisit that once I have completed my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希顿了顿，随后微微一笑，以略带不同的语气补充道。{/n}“我想补充一下，我们一直都没有机会在不太紧急的情况下交谈。等我的任务完成之后，我希望能和你有机会再聊聊。”

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator hält inne. Dann lächelt er sanft und fügt in einem leicht anderen Tonfall hinzu:{/n} "Darf ich ergänzen, dass wir noch keine Gelegenheit hatten, uns unter weniger fordernden Umständen zu unterhalten? Ich hoffe, das können wir ändern, wenn ich meine Mission abgeschlossen habe."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator pauses. He then faintly smiles and adds in a slightly different tone,{/n} "Might I add that we still haven't had a chance to speak under less demanding circumstances? I hope we can revisit that once I have completed my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator hält inne. Dann lächelt er sanft und fügt in einem leicht anderen Tonfall hinzu:{/n} "Darf ich ergänzen, dass wir noch keine Gelegenheit hatten, uns unter weniger fordernden Umständen zu unterhalten. Ich hoffe, das können wir ändern, wenn ich meine Mission abgeschlossen habe."

languages.text: {n}El interrogador realiza una pausa. Luego muestra una leve sonrisa y añade, cambiando el tono:{/n} «Debería añadir que todavía no hemos tenido la oportunidad de hablar en un ambiente más relajado. Espero que podamos hacerlo cuando complete mi misión».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator pauses. He then faintly smiles and adds in a slightly different tone,{/n} "Might I add that we still haven't had a chance to speak under less demanding circumstances? I hope we can revisit that once I have completed my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador realiza una pausa. Luego muestra una leve sonrisa y añade, cambiando el tono:{/n} «Debería añadir que todavía no hemos tenido la oportunidad de hablar en un ambiente más relajado. Espero que podamos hacerlo cuando complete mi misión».

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターがポカンとする。そしてふっと笑みをこぼし、先ほどと少し違う声色で付け加えた。{/n}「まだ、お互いに気楽な状況で話す機会がなかったと補足させていただきた。我の任務が終わったら、もう一度話をしましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator pauses. He then faintly smiles and adds in a slightly different tone,{/n} "Might I add that we still haven't had a chance to speak under less demanding circumstances? I hope we can revisit that once I have completed my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターがポカンとする。そしてふっと笑みをこぼし、先ほどと少し違う声色で付け加えた。{/n}「まだ、お互いに気楽な状況で話す機会がなかったと補足させていただきた。我の任務が終わったら、もう一度話をしましょう」

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu duraksıyor, ardından hafifçe gülümseyerek biraz farklı bir ses tonunda ekliyor.{/n} "Daha iyi şartlar altında konuşma fırsatı bulamadığımızı da ekleyebilir miyim? Umarım görevimi tamamladıktan sonra onu da yapabiliriz."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator pauses. He then faintly smiles and adds in a slightly different tone,{/n} "Might I add that we still haven't had a chance to speak under less demanding circumstances? I hope we can revisit that once I have completed my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu duraksıyor, ardından hafifçe gülümseyerek biraz farklı bir ses tonunda ekliyor:{/n} "Daha az çetin şartlar altında konuşma fırsatı hâlâ bulamadığımızı da ekleyebilir miyim? Umarım görevimi tamamladıktan sonra o konuya da eğilebiliriz."
